mapper.select: select r.*, m.userNick, m.profile from review r join member m on r.member = m.idx where rent = #{idx}
select filePath from review_img where review = #{review}
mapper.insert: insert into review (member, rent, content, point) values (${member}, ${rent}, #{content}, ${point})
mapper.delete: delete from review where review.idx = ${reviewIdx} and review.member = ${memberIdx}
